AboutMe.AboutMeText: My name is Maryna, I am a professional photographer. I specialize in portrait, couple and NY photography. I received an education in the field of photography and am constantly improving myself through courses and master classes. I take inspiration for my works from feature films and art, striving to create unique and emotionally rich shots for each client.

FAQ.question: How can I book a photo session?
FAQ.answer: You can book a photo session by contacting me through the contact form on the website, by calling or sending an email. We will agree on a convenient time and shooting details for you.

FAQ.question: How long does it take to process photos?
FAQ.answer: Photo processing usually takes 1 to 2 weeks, depending on the scope of work and the selected service package. I always inform clients of the expected deadline at the time of the shoot.

FAQ.question: Can I order photos to be printed?
FAQ.answer: Yes, I offer photo printing services on high quality photo paper. You can choose different formats and materials for printing by discussing this at the time of ordering.

FAQ.question: What are your prices for photo sessions?
FAQ.answer: Prices depend on the type of photo session and duration. A detailed price list can be found on my website in the "Price" section or by contacting me directly.

FAQ.question: How do I get my photos?
FAQ.answer: Once processing is complete, the photos will be available for download via a secure online album or provided on a flash drive, as you wish.

FAQ.question: Can I choose a place for a photo session?
FAQ.answer: Yes, you can suggest your favorite location for the photo shoot, or I can offer several options to choose from, based on your wishes and the theme of the shoot.

FAQ.question: Is it possible to order a gift certificate for a photo session?
FAQ.answer: Yes, I offer photo shoot gift certificates. This is a great gift for your loved ones for any holiday. The certificate can be ordered through my website or by contacting me personally.
